title: A Long Way Home
prompt:
Choose ONE goal (pick 1 line):
A) pass an exam
B) learn English
C) get fit (exercise)
D) save money
E) visit a place

Answer in 3 short sentences:
1) My goal was to ____.
2) I worked on it by ____.
3) In the end, I felt ____.
hint:
If you don't know what to write, just copy one goal above and fill the blanks.
Tip words: every day / after school / with my friend / for 10 minutes / little by little
sample:
My goal was to pass an exam.
I worked on it by studying a little every day.
In the end, I felt proud.

ja.prompt:
まず「1つ選ぶ」（どれか1行）：
A) 試験に合格する
B) 英語を勉強する
C) 運動して健康になる
D) お金を貯める
E) 行きたい場所に行く

短い3文で答えます：
1) My goal was to ____.
2) I worked on it by ____.
3) In the end, I felt ____.
ja.hint:
思いつかなければ、上の目標を1つそのまま使って空欄を埋めてください。
使える言葉：every day / after school / with my friend / for 10 minutes / little by little
ja.sample:
My goal was to pass an exam.
I worked on it by studying a little every day.
In the end, I felt proud.

zh.prompt:
先「選一個」目標（挑 1 行）：
A) 考試通過
B) 學英文
C) 變健康／運動
D) 存錢
E) 去一個地方

用 3 句短句回答：
1) My goal was to ____.
2) I worked on it by ____.
3) In the end, I felt ____.
zh.hint:
不知道寫什麼就直接把上面其中一個目標放進去，再把空格補起來。
可用詞：every day／after school／with my friend／for 10 minutes／little by little
zh.sample:
My goal was to pass an exam.
I worked on it by studying a little every day.
In the end, I felt proud.

title: I Have an Idea
prompt:
Choose ONE problem (pick 1 line):
A) I missed the bus.
B) I forgot my homework.
C) I got lost.
D) My phone had no battery.
E) I argued with a friend.

Answer in 3 short sentences:
1) The problem was ____.
2) My idea was to ____.
3) In the end, ____.
hint:
Keep it simple. One problem + one idea + one result.
Useful verbs: asked / used / called / waited / walked / apologized
sample:
The problem was that I missed the bus.
My idea was to use a map app and walk home.
In the end, I got home safely.

E) 友だちとけんかした

短い3文で答えます：
1) The problem was ____.
2) My idea was to ____.
3) In the end, ____.
ja.hint:
シンプルでOK：問題1つ＋アイデア1つ＋結果1つ。
よく使う動詞：asked / used / called / waited / walked / apologized
ja.sample:
The problem was that I missed the bus.
My idea was to use a map app and walk home.
In the end, I got home safely.

2) My idea was to ____.
3) In the end, ____.
zh.hint:
越簡單越好：一個問題＋一個方法＋一個結果。
常用動詞：asked / used / called / waited / walked / apologized
zh.sample:
